title: Morningstars
content:
iant Strike: On a hit, inflict 1 turn of Radiating Orb upon the target.Sanctified Weapon: Undead creatures struck by this weapon are possibly turned. Dawnburst Strike: Deal additional Radiant damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus. On a hit, light erupts around you in an area. Enemies in the light must succeed a DC 13 Constitution Saving Throw or be Blinded.

Tenacity: When you miss an attack, deal (STR Mod) Bludgeoning damage anyway.
